game.name: Bomberball
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Bomberball is a sci-fi multiplayer sports-shooter hybrid with class-based loadouts. Run, pass, and throw a planet-killer bomb into the opposing team’s rift. Fight in tightly-crafted arenas, and coordinate formations with your teammates. Experience the fast-paced, strategic combat of the future.
